mapper.select: select a.id, a.name, a.uuid, a.type, a.cpf_id, a.datacenter_id, a.cluster_id, a.status, a.ip, a.port, ifnull(a.cpu, '0') cpu, ifnull(a.memory, '0') memory, ifnull(a.localdisk, '0') localdisk, a.devicenum, a.duedate, a.account, a.password_ssh, DATE_FORMAT(a.gmt_create, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') gmt_create, a.gmt_modified , b.name clusterName , ifnull(c.cpuUse, 0) cpuUse , ifnull(c.memUse, 0) memUse , ifnull(c.storeUse, 0) storeUse from t_hostmachine a left join t_cluster b on b.id=a.cluster_id left join (select hostmachine_id, sum(cpu) cpuUse, sum(memory) memUse, sum(datadisk) storeUse from t_virtualmachine group by hostmachine_id) c on c.hostmachine_id=a.id
